home.title: zhiva.ai
home.subTitle: Powering AI for radiology
home.productsTitle: Software platform for fast and easy deployment of AI models for radiology.
home.productsDesc: Use our platform to integrate various AI solutions into your radiology workflow. Consolidate multiple AI models into one convenient tool. Provide radiologists with a tool that improves their productivity and reduces costs.

perks.title: AI model integration
perks.description: Our platform is a one-stop-shop for cutting-edge, clinically validated AI models for radiology. A wide range of products empowers doctors in various high-value clinical scenarios.

perks.title: A smooth experience
perks.description: Zhiva is available for deployment in-cloud and on-premise and comes with a zero-footprint DICOM viewer, which enables seamless integration into current workflows.

perks.title: Share results with doctors or patients
perks.description: Sharing both images and AI results with other clinicians is as simple as a single click. You can send these results to your patients as well.
